Name: X-RACER
About the game: 'X-RACER' is a flying racing game in which players control an illusory plane and fly in an illusory space. Players need to control the direction to avoid obstacles in the virtual space. The farther you fly, the higher the score you get. 【Game Operation】 Move left: A move right :D 【Game Features】 The speed of the game will become faster and faster with time, so the difficulty will become more and more difficult, and the player needs to have a certain reaction speed. After the plane controlled by the player passes through the halo, a certain amount of gold coins can be obtained, and the gold coins can be used to purchase new plane styles or score bonus items in the store.
